sentences: Front End Developer – React – Javascript – Technical Lead
Looking for a new venture/ exciting opportunity? Hybrid Working
My client based in Peterborough is looking for a Front End Technical Lead
A great team to be a part of and an opportunity for you to be the person to drive projects/ deadlines through to the end
Want to move into a lead role?
Can you bring any experience in designing, building and deploying first-class software?
Do you champion a DevSecOps mindset, deploying via automated CI/CD pipelines, creating cloud-native applications with infrastructure-as-code
Tech Stack – AWS, React, HTML , Docker
Please email me your CV so we can discuss the opportunity and be part of something exciting!
